meanings.definition: A toxic alkaloid found in certain mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: Eating mushrooms containing muscarines can be harmful.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the effects of muscarines on the human body.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled muscarines on the wizard's dinner.
meanings.sent4: The presence of muscarines in the mushrooms added a deadly twist to the tale.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the tiny but potent muscarines lurking in the forest mushrooms.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of toxic alkaloids found in certain mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: Some people are more sensitive to muscarines than others.
meanings.sent2: The identification of different muscarines in mushrooms is crucial for safety.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally used muscarines instead of regular mushrooms in the soup.
meanings.sent4: The variety of muscarines present in the fungi made them particularly dangerous.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of muscarines warned the foragers of the poisonous mushrooms.

meanings.definition: A type of poison found in certain mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: Foraging for mushrooms requires knowledge of muscarines to avoid poisoning.
meanings.sent2: The toxicity of muscarines varies depending on the mushroom species.
meanings.sent3: The villain in the story used muscarines to concoct a deadly potion.
meanings.sent4: The presence of muscarines turned the innocent mushrooms into lethal traps.
meanings.sent5: The bright color of the mushrooms hinted at the danger of hidden muscarines.
